info.title: Västtrafik REST API for WSO2 API Manager
info.description:
This document describe a ** RESTFul API ** for WSO2 **API Manager**.

You can find the source of this API definition at [here](https://github.com/vasttrafik/wso2-apim-developer-portal-api). It was written with [swagger 2](http://swagger.io/).

get.description: Get a list of available APIs qualifying under a given search condition.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
** Search condition **.

If no advanced attribute modifier is found search will match the given query string against API Name.

You can search in attributes by using **"attribute:"**modifier.

Eg. "provider:WSO2" will match if the API provider is wso2. Matching is case-insensitive.

Supported attribute modifiers are [ **name, version, context, status, description, document, provider** ]

Document is matched against all properties of all documents for all APIs.

200.description: OK. List of APIs is returned.

next.description: Link for next page. Undefined if no next page.

previous.description: Link for previous page. Undefined if no previous page.

Content-Type.description: The content type of the body.

ETag.description: Entity Tag of the response resource. Used by caches, or in conditional requests.

304.description: Not Modified. Empty body because the client has already the latest version of the requested resource.

401.description: Unauthorized. Either the request did not contain a valid Authorization header, or the access token expired and needs to be refreshed.

406.description: Not Acceptable. The requested media type is not supported

200.description: OK Requested API will be returned

Content-Type.description: The content type of the body.

ETag.description: Entity Tag of the response resource. Used by caches, or in conditional requests.

Last-Modified.description: Date and time the resource has been modifed the last time. Used by caches, or in conditional reuquests.

304.description: Not Modified. Empty body because the client has already the latest version of the requested resource.

401.description: Unauthorized. Either the request did not contain a valid Authorization header, or the access token expired and needs to be refreshed.

404.description: Not Found. Requested API does not exist.

406.description: Not Acceptable. The requested media type is not supported

get.description: Get a list of documents belonging to an API

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
** Search condition **.

If no advanced attribute modifier is found search will match the given query string against document Name.

You can search in attributes by using **"attribute:"**modifier.

Eg. "type:FILE" will match if the document type is file. Matching is case-insensitive. 

Supported attribute modifiers are [ **name, type, summary** ]

next.description: Link for next page. Undefined if no next page.

previous.description: Link for previous page. Undefined if no previous page.

ETag.description: Entity Tag of the response resource. Used by caches, or in conditional requests.

406.description: Not Acceptable. The requested media type is not supported

get.description: Get a list of Applications created. For subscribers, the list will be restricted by ownership.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
** Search condition **.

If no advanced attribute modifier is found search will match the given query string against application Name.

You can search in attributes by using **"attribute:"**modifier.

Eg. "status:ACTIVE" will match if the application status is active. Matching is case-insensitive. 

Supported attribute modifiers are [ **name, tier, status, description** ]

next.description: Link for next page. Undefined if no next page.

previous.description: Link for previous page. Undefined if no previous page.

Content-Type.description: The content type of the body.

ETag.description: Entity Tag of the response resource. Used by caches, or in conditional requests.

304.description: Not Modified. Empty body because the client has already the latest version of the requested resource.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request or validation error

401.description: Unauthorized. Either the request did not contain a valid Authorization header, or the access token expired and needs to be refreshed.

406.description: Not Acceptable. The requested media type is not supported

post.description: Performs either a login, a logout or refreshes the access token.

parameters.name: refreshToken
parameters.description: The refresh token, if trying to refresh the access token

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Credential object, if trying to login.

200.description: OK. Successful response with the refreshed access token as part of the authenticated user object.

Content-Type.description: The content type of the body.

201.description: Authorized. Successful response with the newly authenticated user as entity in the body.

Content-Type.description: The content type of the body.

ETag.description: Entity Tag of the response resource. Used by caches, or in conditional request

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request or validation error

401.description: Unauthorized. Either the request did not contain a valid Authorization header, or the access token expired and needs to be refreshed.

apiId.name: apiId
apiId.description:
**API ID** consisting name version and provider of the API. 
Should be formated as **name--version_provider**

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Maximum size of API array to return.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Starting point of the item list.

Accept.name: Accept
Accept.description: Media types for the response. Should denote XML or JSON, default is JSON.

Content-Type.name: Content-Type
Content-Type.description: Media type of the entity in the request body. Should denote XML or JSON, default is JSON.

If-None-Match.name: If-None-Match
If-None-Match.description: Validator for conditional requests; based on ETag.

If-Modified-Since.name: If-Modified-Since
If-Modified-Since.description: Validator for conditional requests; based on Last Modified header.

If-Match.name: If-Match
If-Match.description: Validator for conditional requests; based on ETag.

If-Unmodified-Since.name: If-Unmodified-Since
If-Unmodified-Since.description: Validator for conditional requests; based on Last Modified header.

Error.title: Error object returned with 4XX HTTP status

description.description: A detail description about the error message.

moreInfo.description: Preferably an url with more details about the error.

items.description: If there are more than one error list them out. Ex. list out validation errors by each field.

ErrorListItem.title: Description of individual errors that may have occored during a request.
